long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ProdBoost helps you be more productive, whether you are a student, someone who works from home, or someone who finds themselves getting distracted online. 

* Block distracting URLs and start blocking sessions.
* Create lists and check items off as you complete them. 
* See insights after a blocking session about your activity.
* Get notified when you have been idle for too long.

View the source code: https://github.com/luke0malley/prodboost
